title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard with an empty package name field, the following message appears at the top: 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'.
EB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard with an empty package name field, there should be no message indicating that a folder already exists for the package name, as this is confusing and unnecessary.
SR:
1. Launch the New Java Package wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Observe the message at the top of the wizard.
